metadata.title: CVE-2019-15214 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.0.10. There is ause-after-free in the sound subsystem because card disconnection causescertain data structures to be deleted too early. This is related tosound/core/init.c and sound/core/info.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15214` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-150-generic - 4.4.0-150.176
